column5: The Master’s degree in Control Systems Engineering aims at training engineers with the ability to model, analyze and control the behavior of a wide array of robotics, industrial, financial, biological and information systems and networks. Particular emphasis is placed on learning and design methods that employ the best available data analysis, artificial intelligence and optimization methods.
column7: Our tuition fees will not exceed 2700 euros per year. Scholarship and fee waivers are available for international students, for more information visit our website.
